Dovje-Mojstrana is a thousand-year-old-village, beautifully laid out among terraced fields and orchards along the southern foot of the steep sunny slopes of the Karavanke, a village with many typical features of alpine architecture preserved, the most outstanding being the arched doorways of farmhouses.

value: , one of most beautiful alpine valleys rests in the utmost Northwestern part of Slovenia,close to borders with Austria and Italy.Mysterious and romantic, embraced by the magnificent peaks the valley gave rise to numerous legends and fairy tales.This valley with many sports events and plenty of entertainment is this place for an active holiday for all who enjoy sport,parties and fun in the snow.
